rows.label: qev090301_MSG0001
rows.name: We got his legs and his left arm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0002
rows.name:
All we gotta do now is hunt down his head and body.
We're almost there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_JNK0010
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: qev090301_SEL0011
rows.name: Remind Yelv that he still needs the right arm.

rows.label: qev090301_JNK0020
rows.name: Comfort

rows.label: qev090301_SEL0021
rows.name: Say it will be nice to finally lay him to rest.

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0003
rows.name: Yeah, this is gonna sound kinda creepy, but...I have it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0004
rows.name: Rest? Shut up! He ain't dead![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0005
rows.name: ...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0006
rows.name:
Oh, and did I ever mention his right arm?
'Cause...I kept it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0007
rows.name: Day of the crash, I watched his Skell get caught in that blast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0008
rows.name: Figured I'd never see him again, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0009
rows.name:
But when I woke up after blackin' out,
his arm was...on top of me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0010
rows.name: Like it was shieldin' me from harm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0011
rows.name: Talk about overprotective, right, pard?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0012
rows.name:
I can't believe a guy like that would leave me behind.
He couldn't have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0013
rows.name: Please, you gotta help me find him. I need this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0014
rows.name: Not like we'll be goin' in blind, either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0015
rows.name:
If we triangulate from where the other parts turned up,
we can narrow down the search.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_JNK0030
rows.name: Insist

rows.label: qev090301_SEL0031
rows.name: Make Yelv face the truth that his friend is gone.

rows.label: qev090301_JNK0040
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev090301_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Yelv that you will do whatever he needs.

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0016
rows.name:
He always got hurt back in the military. Shot,
blown up, whatever. Didn't matter. He always came back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0017
rows.name: He's a tough bastard. It'll take more than this to finish him off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0018
rows.name:
But we gotta hurry. He's waitin' out there.
I can't leave him all alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0019
rows.name: I owe you one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0020
rows.name:
Now, c'mon. He's waitin' out there.
We can't leave him all alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090301_MSG0021
rows.name:
Let's go ask Eleonora if she can calculate
where he might've come down.[ST:wait ]
